metadata.title: CVE-2020-13956 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache HttpClient versions prior to version 4.5.13 and 5.0.3 canmisinterpret malformed authority component in request URIs passed to thelibrary as java.net.URI object and pick the wrong target host for requestexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13956` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhttpclient-java - 4.5.13-1
libhttpmime-java - 4.5.13-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: httpcomponents-client package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.13-1').
